page.title: 06The Family 1.
page.content: My family lives in a semi-detached house with three bedrooms,a lounge where the family can sit and relax watching television, and a kitchen where my mum prepares food for the family to eat.My mum goes out to work at the Coca-Cola factory usually leaving the house at 7.30a.m.At the factory she puts fizzy drink into bottles. My dad goes to work at 7.00 a.m.He works at the Talbot car factory in Coventry where he drives a fork-lift truck. My teenage brother goes to Wolston High School by school bus with many other teenage children who live in the village. My name is Sharon and I am 12 years old.I go to Long Lawford Combined School but will be going to a High School later on this year.
